title: Resilience: Japan Attacks Pearl Harbor
itunes:title: Resilience: Japan Attacks Pearl Harbor
itunes:subtitle: Today on our series, Resilience, we are going to hear more from author Craig Nelson, who shares insights on what exactly happened during the bombing of Pearl Harbor on December 7th, 1941.
description:
Today on our series, Resilience, we are going to hear more from author Craig Nelson, who shares insights on what exactly happened during the bombing of Pearl Harbor on December 7th, 1941.

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
